game.name: Pocket Ninja
game.description:
A complete free adventure game online, Pocket Ninja is your last chance to save the planet from the clutches of demonic forces of evil. As a master ninja warrior in the war adventure games series online, you share the optimum responsibility of fighting the worst powers of dark as a saviour of humanity.

In the pocket ninja game you kill enemies across 30 stages of game using the fusion capacity as offered through highly interactive game play. It is just not only indefinable courage you hold takes you to path of successive wins but also backed by all sorts of weapons provided to you as swords, arrows and martial art combat skills in this cool online war adventure game for boys and girls assure a victory.

In this game, you will be tested for your war strategy and leadership skills along with valour and bravery. Subsequently, at the stages of the game you will have to best of your soldiers and lead them to reach the last stage either as a group or individually. However, according to the need of war strategy, the ninjas even can be separated and guided to finish the war quickly.

While playing pocket ninja game, there is an interactive system that let you to earn money and bonus point as you progresses from one stage of game to another one. The earned money helps you to buy weapons and special powers in the due course of your fight against the evil forces.
game.metaTitle: Pocket Ninja, War Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Enjoy the thrill of adventure game online playing Pocket Ninja, your last chance to save the planet from the clutches of demonic forces of evil war adventure games online.
